snippet: The Federal Reserve’s policy committee signaled in a statement that it was ready to take new action if job growth did not improve.
abstract: Federal Reserve takes no new steps to support the economy, but says it is ready to act as early as mid-September if job growth does not improve; says economic growth has slowed in recent months and is likely to remain moderate.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve’s policy committee signaled in a statement that it was ready to take new action if job growth did not improve.

headline.seo: Fed Says Economy Is Slowing, but Defers New Action
headline.main: Fed Sees Slowing Economy, but Defers New Action
headline.print_headline: Fed Defers New Action, But Growth Has Slowed
